html:
3.1.19  8:25 am   2.28.19  7:07 pm what the fuck. not subtitling your videos is plain fucking dumb. do you know what would happen if you subtitled your videos? more people would be able to understand them, therefore, you would amass a much greater following, and millions more people would be able to enjoy your work. I understand you probably think that your shit is far too complex to understand without rerecording vocals and rewriting English text, but I can assure you in the nicest way possible,

     it is not. I think that people who don't speak English would just be appreciative of the fact that they have a translation of the video and would not ask for any more than that.

      I also think that a lot of people would prefer to enjoy your videos in their original format than have a redone one. and like you said, it is basically impossible (at this point in time at least) for you to make these kinds of redone videos. so the way see it is you have two options: keep community subtitles off and only let the English speakers understand what the fuck your saying, or turn them the fuck on and be fucking nice to people who weren't born in an English speaking country.

      I'm sorry but it makes me mad that you refuse to do a simple thing that would mean sooooo many more people would be able to enjoy your shit.

      thank you for doing what you're doing. you are one of my favourite artists. have a lovely night.


embedded answer: https://billwurtz.com/questions/q.php?date=201902281907

2.28.19  7:07 pm   Hey, why don't you allow people to make subtitles for your videos? That way people from all over the world will be able to understand them! 

     i disagree. i think the only way someone in another native language would be able to properly understand would be if i were to do a thorough re-write, with the help of a great writer in that language, and/or translator, including a lot of trust building to ensure that all the material is hitting the same way and properly adapted to sit comfortably in that language. then do a re-casting and re-recording of the vocal (the casting process would be an additional process which was never done in the first place because it was be me by default), then re-editing all the graphics, translating them and also adjusting the entire thing for time, and surely some content adjustments as well, due to new script. re-writing nearly all the jingles/vocal music entirely. recording the new music. and finally rescoring the underscore music. this would be a wonderful project to take on, but given the large amount of future projects to be done, it is simply not a priority to do alternate versions of previous projects

2.24.19  10:59 pm   how do i pay attention in school

     paying attention is effortless, if the material is any good. if the material is not good, pay attention to why it's not good. this will imbue some knowledge of what to avoid later when you make your own material one day
